e: ￹`O~ `pa~`pakokot~`en~ `ko~ `demak~ `noya~ `tamdaw~.￺An accusation must be made against the acts of that person.￻那個人的行為勢必應該被控告
￹`Aka~ `pacefa~ `a~ `pakokot~ `to~ `demak~ `no~ `singsi~.￺Don't accuse without clear evidence the acts of a teacher.￻沒有證據不要隨便告發老師的行為
d.f: ￹￺to accuse * to make a charge against * with reference to actions￻控訴，控告，打小報告，誹謗，說壞話
